content: He then commands Wadatsumi to destroy the Thousand Sunny. The Straw Hats are saved when the Kraken shows up out of nowhere and punches Wadatsumi. Everyone on the ship is surprised to see it again. The Kraken continues to beat up the giant until Luffy orders him to stop, which it does. Everyone is relieved to see that Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji are alive. Luffy did not like it in the cramped bubble, and he sprawls out on the deck of the ship, happy for so much room. As the Thousand Sunny is placed on the Kraken's head, Luffy declares that he will turn the Kraken, whom he has named Surume, into a top-notch navigator. Usopp says that they should be careful to ensure that the ship is not crushed. Everyone then hears a rumbling sound coming from one of the volcanoes. Vander Decken's crew alerts him that there is trouble as Nami realizes the volcano is about to erupt.
